mapper.insert: insert into t_maintain_detail(detailId, recordId, maintainId, maintainDiscount, detailCreatedTime) values(uuid(), #{recordId}, #{maintainId}, #{maintainDiscount}, now())
mapper.update: update t_maintain_detail set recordId = #{recordId}, maintainId = #{maintainId}, maintainDiscount = #{maintainDiscount}, detailCreatedTime = now() where detailId = #{detailId}
mapper.select:
select d.*, r.recordId, r.checkinId, f.maintainId, f.maintainName, f.maintainMoney, c.checkinId, c.userName, c.maintainOrFix, c.userPhone from t_maintain_detail d, t_maintain_record r, t_maintain_fix f, t_checkin c where d.recordId = r.recordId and d.maintainId = f.maintainId and r.checkinId = c.checkinId
order by d.detailCreatedTime desc limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_maintain_detail where recordId = #{recordId}
